channel.title: Making Item Leave Slot
channel.description: Like Rune Arrows for example when shot by a bow they leave the arrow slot but, I have updated dbolts and rune cbow on my server but you can shoot the cbow with bolts, and when you have a single bolt in the slot it doesnt get fired...any help with those two problems such as - making the cbow not fire without bolts, and make the bolts actually leave

item.title: Making Item Leave Slot
